name: GrayWikipedia
description: More lisible & readable text: smaller columns, wider line-height, serif text, etc. Choose the font & color, replace the logo with a “w”. Fixed top menu. Works for the majority of Wikimedia sites.

style_setting_options.label: Sans Serif
style_setting_options.value: Trebuchet, Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
